fields.description: A unique value for each logical storage area contained by the host
fields.name: index

fields.description: The type of storage represented by this entry.
fields.name: hrStorageType

fields.description: A description of the type and instance of the storage described by this entry.
fields.name: hrStorageDescr

fields.description: The size, in bytes, of the data objects allocated from this pool.  If this entry is monitoring sectors, blocks, buffers, or packets, for example, this number will commonly be greater than one. Otherwise this number will typically be one.
fields.name: hrStorageAllocated

fields.description: The size of the storage represented by this entry, in units of hrStorageAllocationUnits.
fields.name: hrStorageSize

fields.description: The amount of the storage represented by this entry that is allocated, in units of hrStorageAllocationUnits.
fields.name: hrStorageUsed

fields.description: This value indicates the RFU transmit Level Status
fields.name: hrStorageAllocationFailure
